title: JML Property Solutions: £48K Paid While Company Faced Strike-Off
author: AI DOGE Investigation
excerpt: Burnley Council paid £48,000 to JML Property Solutions Ltd while the company was actively facing compulsory strike-off and had filed dormant accounts — suggesting it wasn't trading legitimately.

blocks.title: Strike-Off Warning Ignored
blocks.subtitle: Council continued paying company flagged for dissolution by Companies House

items: JML Property Solutions facing compulsory strike-off
Filed dormant accounts while receiving council payments

blocks.heading: The Strike-Off Red Flag
blocks.content: When Companies House initiates compulsory strike-off proceedings, it's typically because the company has failed to file required documents (annual accounts or confirmation statements). This is a public warning that the company may be inactive, non-compliant, or potentially fraudulent. Continuing to award contracts to such companies represents a serious procurement failure.

blocks.heading: Dormant + Paid = Contradiction
blocks.content: A company that files 'dormant' accounts is declaring it had no significant transactions during the period. Yet JML Property Solutions received £48,000 from Burnley Council during this time. This contradiction raises questions about either the accuracy of the filed accounts or the legitimacy of the services provided.

blocks.heading: Property Services Question
blocks.content: Given the company name, JML Property Solutions likely provided property-related services to the council — possibly maintenance, management, or consultancy. Property services often involve access to council buildings and assets, making supplier vetting particularly important. The governance failures here compound the risk.

blocks.heading: Procurement Process Failure
blocks.content: Standard public sector procurement requires suppliers to demonstrate financial stability and good standing. A company facing strike-off and filing dormant accounts should fail these checks. Either the checks weren't performed, or the issues were known and ignored — both scenarios warrant investigation.

blocks.heading: Follow the Money
blocks.text: View the complete payment history for JML Property Solutions Ltd and see what services were supposedly provided during the dormant period.
